title: High Wizardry
description: 'If she lights out in the middle of nowhere without meaning the Oath she took, she's going to be in trouble up to her neck ...'Nita's younger sister, Dairine, is smart. Too smart. When she discovers that Nita is a wizard, she wants to be one too, and a new family computer gives her the opportunity when it clones itself and provides Dairine with a software version of the Wizard Manual.Totally unprepared, Dairine finds herself catapulted far into outer space to a series of strange worlds in other galaxies. And the Lone Power is on her trail! True to their Oath of Wizardry, Nita and Kit must follow and try to help Dairine survive her Ordeal. But the youngest wizards hold the greatest power ...
author: Diane Duane
